divs: sighting detailsessentially static and distant (5 miles altitude, estimate) - basically a blue light or reflective material. came in and out of presence, as if rotating, and only one aspect of the object was illuminated (or reflecting evening sun). my first thought was metalic weather balloon, but do they use them anymore? moreover, object was static, did not move, for at least 15 minutes. viewed with binoculars but only appeared like a larger version of the light\reflection i was seeing and revealed no further detail\objectivity. no great or overwhelming sense of having seen a ufo, but just weird enough to be "interesting". by itself, i would disregard this "sighting", unless you receive other information, reports, etc... thanks, k
Summary: Blue light (in daylight) like blue star (Off/On).
trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Bellingham
There were no other sightings in Bellingham on or around July 26th 2010
